original_title: Party Leaders meeting in parliament today (20)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena will chair a party leaders meeting in Parliament on Thursday (20).
The agenda for the 25th of April 2023, and for the remaining session, will be discussed at this meeting.
Justice Minister Dr. Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe, PC, recently said that the proposed Anti-Terrorism Bill will be tabled in Parliament next week.
